content:
The moment you start running a tx, the content gets revealed 
I am not saying is easy piece, but I am wondering if there is any EIP looking to mitigate the MEV specially sandwich attacks. At the beginning it was only affecting big whales, but currently anyone can suffer from a sandwitch attack

author: sky.cactus
content: There is currently no viable EIP, because there is no known viable solution.  If you think you have a full solution to the problem, I recommend starting at https://ethresear.ch/.

author: sky.cactus
content: Keep in mind, that while lots of people agree that it would be great to solve the MEV problem, this doesn't mean that a solution is possible without sacrificing more important ideals like censorship resistance, sybil resistance, trustless interactions, etc.
